name: Rowboat (Unearthed Arcana)
speed: 3 miles per hour (72 miles per day)
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

trait.name: Movement:
text: Locomotion (water): oars, speed 15 ft. Move up to its speed, with one 90-degree turn. Without oars, the Rowboat (Unearthed Arcana)'s speed is 0.

description: Source: Unearthed Arcana: Of Ships And Sea p. 4
